metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart reflects on Viconia's jewelry, gifted to her by Queen Ellesime

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Mother Superior's jewels - a gift from the queen of Suldanessellar... I suppose they're mine now.
0.context: NodeContext: Sull-duh-ness-seh-llar (name of an elven city). 'to the victor, the spoils'

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Curious. I could never quite tell if she was proud of them or not.
3.context: NodeContext: Thoughtful - 'how well did I really know her?'

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Interesting jewellery. Certainly not from around here.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: These jewels... why do I remember these, of all things? A gift from Suldanessellar, Mother Superior said.
2.context: NodeContext: Sull-duh-ness-seh-llar (name of an elven city).

4.speaker: Player
4.text: Elf jewellery. Royal jewellery in fact, from Suldanessellar, I believe. A curious find.
4.context: NodeContext: Sull-duh-ness-seh-llar (name of an elven city). Intrigued.
